name: Stronger together (Devhut)
description:
Years ago... The village was undergoing a raid, and the King had fallen into enemy hands. In this game you will play as an archer, gather and assemble the knights to rescue the King. Remember, Stronger together!

The knight will be activate within a certain distance, keep the distance to remain alliance.

Ran into a bug at last, the victory screen should pop up while the boss was defeated.

All the code and art are designed for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1.

Music by https://www.zapsplat.com
